channel.title: Chess on Rob's Notes
channel.description: Recent content in Chess on Rob's Notes

item.title: The Queen's Gambit and the feeling of nostalgia
item.description: “It’s foolish to run the risk of going mad for vanity’s sake." ~ French Philosopher Diderot (From Netflix’s “The Queen’s Gambit” 1) The Dream # For the first time in so many years, I had a dream about Chess.
